out_of_memory.title: Bubble Blaster ran out of memory!
out_of_memory.line1: Either you have modded the game too much or there's a serious memory leak in the game!
out_of_memory.line2: If there's a serious memory leak in the game, pls report an issue on the GitHub <3

description.normal: The ordinary normal bubble, only has 1 score modifier, is very common, and has no attack.
description.damage: This bubble attacks, it has a static attack modifier of 1, watch out!
description.level_up:
This bubble only appears if your can go a level higher. 
For some math: S = score, L = level: L < S ÷ 10'000 + 1
description.double: This bubble has more value in score, you will get double the score than the Normal Bubble.
description.triple: This bubble has even more value in score than the Double Value Bubble, you will get triple the score than the Normal Bubble.
description.double_state: This bubble gives you for an period of time double the score of bubbles.
description.triple_state: This bubble gives you for an period of time triple the score of bubbles.
description.blindness: This bubble is annoying, when touching, it will darken the screen like if you were blind. Will be temporary, how larger the bubble how darker the screen will be.
description.poison: This bubble will ‘poison’ the player, meaning it will hard to see what bubble is which, and over time the player will take damage. Btw, the statusEffect is temporary.
description.bouncy: Work In Progress (WIP), the bounce bubble would bounce the player from it. There are currently problems with it.
description.heal: This bubble will restore health, so simple is it.
description.hyper: Work In Progress (WIP), this bubble has currently no special notes.
description.attack: Gives you an ‘attack’ boost, when touched you can destroy bubbles faster for an period of time.
description.defense: Gives you an ‘defense’ boost, when touched your damage that you take will be reduced for an period of time.
description.accelerate: This bubble will boost the player's speed as long it's inside or touching the bubble.
description.speed_boost: This bubble will increase the speed of the player for an period of time. Btw, the statusEffect is temporary.
description.bubble_freeze: This bubble will freeze all bubbles for an period of time.
description.paralyze: This bubble will paralyze the player for an period of time.
description.hardened: A bubble that's harder to destroy than others.
description.ultra: The most overpowered bubble there is, will have all positive effects (not yet mod support), and gives 10x more score than the normal bubble.
